ygData.subject: OCR (Optical Character Recognition)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi! I ve been hacking away at a simple OCR demo using DelphiNEAT. I let NEAT see a picture (7 x 14 pixels) of a letter and let it choose which letter it thinks

Subject: OCR (Optical Character Recognition)
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=29390171
X-Yahoo-Profile: mattias_fagerlund

Hi!

I've been hacking away at a simple OCR demo using DelphiNEAT. I let NEAT 
see a picture (7 x 14 pixels) of a letter and let it choose which letter 
it thinks it is (out of 26 letters). Thus, I have 7*14=98 inputs + 1 
bias. And I have 26 outputs. Creating a connection from every input to 
every output leads to 99*26 = 2574 connections per network. 

Now, I've tried a method where I add X random connections instead of the 
full 2574 connections, but so far, the results are depressing.

Does anyone have an idea for a better method?

cheers,
m
